venue.address_1: Corner of Main Street and Wheelock Street
venue.name: Collis Center Room 218

item.description:
Hi everyone!

Come out for our second potluck of the fall and bring your friends! Everyone is welcome vegan and non-vegan!

When? Sunday Nov. 21 at 6 PM
Where? Collis Room 218, Dartmouth College, Hanover

This month's vegan potluck will be centered around the theme of Thanksgiving. Please bring your favorite vegan Thanksgiving dish to share with others, along with the recipe. We will copy the recipe and email it to everyone! Lola will bring the seitan 'turkey' from Cafe Indigo.

I'm also hoping that we can have a lively discussion about how to (politely) deal with the inevitable sticky situations that arise when enjoying a Thanksgiving meal with omnivorous family members.

Lastly, let's give a turkey something to be thankful for! We will collect donations to adopt as a group a rescued turkey at Farm Sanctuary. You can learn more about the Adopt a Turkey Project here.

Hope to see you this Sunday evening!

peace,
Kimberly and Lola
item.name: Thanksgiving Theme Potluck and Recipe Exchange!
